comments.body: Would like to see positive and negative test cases for this.
Already had the positive test case. I added a negative one in client_config_test.go

Done

On Thu, Jun 4, 2015 at 2:34 PM, Daniel Smith notifications@github.com
wrote:

> In pkg/client/clientcmd/client_config.go
> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/9171#discussion_r31750680
> :
> 
> > @@ -85,6 +86,11 @@ func (config DirectClientConfig) ClientConfig() (*client.Config, error) {
> > 
> > ```
> > clientConfig := &client.Config{}
> > clientConfig.Host = configClusterInfo.Server
> > ```
> > -   if u, err := url.ParseRequestURI(clientConfig.Host); err == nil && u.Opaque == "" && len(u.Path) > 1 {
> > -       clientConfig.Prefix = u.Path
> > -       u.Path = ""
> 
> Recommend also clearing RawQuery, too.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/9171/files#r31750680
> .

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +89,93 @@	if u, err := url.ParseRequestURI(clientConfig.Host); err == nil && u.Opaque == "" && len(u.Path) > 1 {
		clientConfig.Prefix = u.Path
		u.Path = ""
		u.RawQuery = ""
		u.Fragment = ""
